item.title: Javascript and its uses
item.description: The Versatile World of JavaScript: Best Use Cases Across Domains By David Eje Contact: d.edje@innopolis.university Table of Contents The Versatile World of JavaScript: Best Use Cases Across Domains - By David Eje Table of Contents Introduction Web Development Server-Side Development Full-Stack Development Mobile Application Development Internet of Things (IoT) Cloud Computing AI and Machine Learning Game Development Education and Prototyping Conclusion Introduction JavaScript, initially designed to make web pages more interactive, has evolved into one of the world’s most versatile and widely used programming languages.
